name: Spacial Rend
effect:
Recharge Move. During the recharge turn, a random ally can take a bonus turn instead 
 At Silver Rank, increase this move's power to 4.
 At Gold Rank, you get to choose which ally gets the bonus turn instead.
 At Platinum Rank, increase this move's power to 6.
 At Diamond Rank, this move gains high critical and inflicts wounds.
description: With a flicker of its claws, Palkia defragments the space around its foe. Those who survive rarely do peserve their original shape.
